subject: Olympic Games (2008)
Track and Field
lead_paragraph: Liu Xiang, the world champion hurdler who is expected to be the face of the Beijing Olympics for the host country, is scheduled to compete at the Reebok Grand Prix on May 31 at Icahn Stadium on Randalls Island. Liu is the Olympic champion and the world-record holder in the 110-meter hurdles. He won the event at last year’s Reebok Grand Prix in 12.92 seconds. Also scheduled to compete are the sprinters Veronica Campbell-Brown and Lauryn Williams. Campbell-Brown edged Williams in the 100 meters at the world championships last year.
